participant_1.background:

I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.
My pets love to swim in the lake in my backyard.
i am an award winning th member.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
i have an iq of 250.
I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends.
i really like cake and don t prefer vegetables.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing great! Just got done working out.
Oh, cool! What do you like to do for exercise?
I like to play tennis. It's a good workout and I can play with my friends.
That's fun! I've never played tennis before. I'm more of a runner.
Have you ever run a marathon?
No, I've never run that far. I have run a half marathon though.
That's awesome! I've never run that far before.
You should try it! It's a great feeling to finish a race.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely think about it.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, watch movies, and hang out with friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I also like to go out to eat, watch movies, and hang out with friends.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime.
I would love that! Let's exchange numbers and we can plan something.
